TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Defines an attribute that specifies the scope where a object should be applied when a resource is located.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> class parses and generates code during compilation for a resource that has a specific file. The <xref:System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribute defines the location scope for which the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> object will be called.
By setting the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribute, you can limit a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> object to certain [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] directories, such as App_Code.
If you do not apply a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesToAttribute> attribute to a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.FolderLevelBuildProvider> class, by default, the attribute targets all directories.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Web.Compilation.FolderLevelBuildProviderAppliesTo appliesTo) cil managed

Docs.param: The target directory that a object applies to.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the target directory that a object applies to.
Docs.value: The directory that a object applies to.
